summary: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.
cast: Will Friedle|Chris Owen|Louise Lasser|Renée Taylor|Nikki Ziering|Rudy De Luca|Jack Ong|J.J. Cole|Carmen Twillie|Gabriel Bologna|Mary Albee|Draegin|Jeff Eveleth|Akira Lane|John Paul Lubran|Rena Riffel|Mary Ann Schmidt|Tawny Amber Young
title: Los chicos de oro
